Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO tmp_accountinformation(guaccountid, accountno, gupromotionid, gudealerid, gucustid, accountclass, accountcategory, accounttype, status, createdate, displayaccountno, companyid, tenantid, viewobjectid) VALUES ('GUAccountID','AccountNo_','GUPromotionID','GUDealerID','GUCustID','AccountClass','AccountCategory','AccountType','Status','CreateDate','DisplayAccountNo',CompanyID,TenantID,ViewObjectID)
Table.PGUpdate: UPDATE tmp_accountinformation set gupromotionid = 'GUPromotionID',gudealerid='GUDealerID',gucustid='GUCustID',accountclass='AccountClass',accountcategory='AccountCategory', accounttype='AccountType', status='Status', displayaccountno = 'DisplayAccountNo' WHERE guaccountid = 'GUAccountID'

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO tmp_profile(profileid, profilecode, profileclass, profiletype, gender, firstname, secondname, lastname, title, phonenumber, mobilenumber, faxnumber, vatregno, email, country, guaddressid, gubillingid, guinstallationid) VALUES ('ProfileID_', 'ProfileCode', 'ProfileClass', 'ProfileType', 'Gender', 'FirstName', 'SecondName', 'LastName', 'Title', 'Phonenumber', 'Mobilenumber', 'FaxNumber', 'VatRegNo', 'EMail', 'Country', 'GUAddressID_', 'GUBillingID_', 'GUInstallationID_')
Table.PGUpdate: UPDATE tmp_profile SET profilecode = 'ProfileCode',profileclass = 'ProfileClass', profiletype = 'ProfileType',gender = 'Gender',firstname = 'FirstName', secondname = 'SecondName', lastname = 'LastName', title = 'Title', phonenumber = 'Phonenumber', mobilenumber = 'Mobilenumber', faxnumber = 'FaxNumber', vatregno = 'VatRegNo', email = 'EMail', country = 'Country', guaddressid = 'GUAddressID_', gubillingid = 'GUBillingID_', guinstallationid = 'GUInstallationID_' WHERE profileid = 'ProfileID_'

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO tmp_accountledger(balance, billed, refno, ledgercode, recordstatus, currencycode, createuser, trandate, refid, guaccountid, ledgerid, transactiontype, trantype, description, amount) VALUES (Balance, 'Billed', RefNo, 'ledgerCode', RecordStatus_, 'CurrencyCode', 'CreateUser', 'TranDate', 'RefID', 'GuAccountID', LedgerID_, 'TransactionType', TranType, 'Description', Amount)
Table.PGUpdate: UPDATE tmp_accountledger SET balance = Balance, billed = 'Billed', refno = RefNo, ledgercode = 'ledgerCode', recordstatus = RecordStatus_, currencycode = 'CurrencyCode', createuser = 'CreateUser', trandate = 'TranDate', refid = 'RefID', guaccountid = 'GuAccountID', transactiontype = 'TransactionType', trantype = TranType, description = 'Description', amount = Amount WHERE ledgerid = LedgerID_

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO tmp_cdrdetail(class, type, category, sessionid, phonenumber, inittime, ivrtime, queuetime, ringtime, talktime, holdtime, holdcount, starttime, endtime, acwtime, resource, skills, callanswered, callqueued, direction, companyid, tenantid, viewobjectid) VALUES ('Class', 'Type', 'Category', 'SessionId', 'PhoneNumber', 'InitTime', 'IvrTime', 'QueueTime', 'RingTime', 'TalkTime', 'HoldTime', 'HoldCount', 'StartTime', 'EndTime', 'AcwTime', 'Agent', 'Skills', 'CallAnswered', 'CallQueued', 'Direction', Company, Tenant, ViewObjectId)
Table.PGUpdate: UPDATE tmp_cdrdetail SET class = 'Class', type = 'Type', category = 'Category', phonenumber = 'PhoneNumber', inittime = 'InitTime', ivrtime = 'IvrTime', queuetime = 'QueueTime', ringtime = 'RingTime', talktime = 'TalkTime', holdtime = 'HoldTime', holdcount = 'HoldCount', starttime = 'StartTime', endtime = 'EndTime', acwtime = 'AcwTime', resource = 'Agent', skills = 'Skills', callanswered = 'CallAnswered', callqueued = 'CallQueued', direction = 'Direction' WHERE sessionid = 'SessionId'
UPDATE ord_entitlement set guaccountid = '@OrderDetails.0.GUPromtionID' WHERE guorderid = '@GUOrderID'

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO bil_receiptheader(gurecid, reciptno, guaccountid, recipttype, status, tax, paidamount, paymethode, reciptdate, advancedno, canceldate, canceluser, createdate, createuser, companyid, tenantid, viewobjectid) VALUES ('GURecID','ReciptNo','GUAccountID','ReciptType','Status','TAX','PaidAmount','PayMethode','ReciptDate','AdvancedNo','CancelDate','CancelUser','CreateDate','CreateUser','CompanyID','TenantID','ViewObjectID')
Table.PGUpdate: UPDATE bil_receiptheader SET guaccountid = 'GUAccountID', recipttype = 'ReciptType', status = 'Status', tax = 'TAX', paidamount = 'PaidAmount', paymethode = 'PayMethode', reciptdate = 'ReciptDate', advancedno = 'AdvancedNo', canceldate = 'CancelDate', canceluser = 'CancelUser', createdate = 'CreateDate', createuser = 'CreateUser', companyid = CompanyID, tenantid = TenantID, viewobjectid = ViewObjectID WHERE gurecid = 'GURecID'

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO bil_attribute(gurefid, attribute, module, value) VALUES ('GURefID', 'Attribute', 'Module', 'Value')

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO sms_productpackagemaster(guproductpkgid, class, type, category, code, description, operationalstatus, printdescription, retailprice, createuser, createdate, gusupplierid, companyid, tenantid, viewobjectid) VALUES ('GUProductPkgID', 'Class', 'Type', 'Category', 'Code', 'Description', 'OperationalStatus', 'PrintDescription', 'RetailPrice', 'CreateUser', 'CreateDate', 'GUSupplierID', CompanyID, TenantID, ViewObjectID)

Table.PGInsert: INSERT INTO cas_smsdetails(datetime, originatingno, terminatingno, message, refid, companyid, tenantid, viewobjectid) VALUES ('DateTime', 'From', 'To', 'Message', 'ID', CompanyID, TenantID, ViewObjectID)
Table.PGUpdate: UPDATE cas_smsdetails SET datetime = 'DateTime', originatingno = 'From', terminatingno = 'To', message = 'Message' WHERE refid = 'ID'
